column4: how do i intall ubuntu6.10 from desktop after i have booted up with the cd in?
*Do* make sure you back up your hard drive if you are installing besides Windows.
Wonderful. It's a lot easier then.
What networking do you have? Modem? LAN? PPPOE?
Have you told it to boot from CD?
i hit install at the boot up screen
Have you seen any text since then?
so still need to hit the INSTALL icon?
i hit the install desktop icon but hav not seen anything since.. just hear cd working
Make sure you double-click. The mouse cursor will turn to a spinning pinwheel while the "Install" window loads.
